archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.5.6d: d) reviewing internal policies (e.g. HR policies, records management policies and document retention schedules) to determine if there are any information security-related obligations.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
